Dana Lee

Hello World!

I'm Dana! I'm from the Philippines studying Computer Science at New York University. I love hackathons, coding, coffee, sleep, yoga, design, jokes, and food. When I feel sad I dance to 90/00s music or sing Beyonce songs. I'm also a fan of promoting ladiez in technology. If you're reading this, we should be friends!!



This website is (always) a work in progress and is made with
